lit_ml: Priest :- (Prayer before the Kiss of Peace)
lit_en: Priest :- (Prayer before the Kiss of Peace)
lit_mn: Priest :- (Prayer before the Kiss of Peace)

lit_ml: (The Acolyte receives the Kiss of peace from the Priest)
lit_en: (The Acolyte receives the Kiss of peace from the Priest)
lit_mn: (The Acolyte receives the Kiss of peace from the Priest)

lit_ml: Acolyte :- Barekmor. Let us in the love of our Lord and our God, give peace to one another; everyone to his neighbour, by the holy and divine kiss.
lit_en: Acolyte :- Barekmor. Let us in the love of our Lord and our God, give peace to one another; everyone to his neighbour, by the holy and divine kiss.
lit_mn: Acolyte :- Barekmor. Let us in the love of our Lord and our God, give peace to one another; everyone to his neighbour, by the holy and divine kiss.

lit_ml: People :- O Lord God, make us worthy of this peace, all the days of our lives.
lit_en: People :- O Lord God, make us worthy of this peace, all the days of our lives.
lit_mn: People :- O Lord God, make us worthy of this peace, all the days of our lives.

lit_ml: Acolyte :- After this holy and divine peace being given, let us now bow our heads before the merciful Lord.
lit_en: Acolyte :- After this holy and divine peace being given, let us now bow our heads before the merciful Lord.
lit_mn: Acolyte :- After this holy and divine peace being given, let us now bow our heads before the merciful Lord.

lit_ml: People :- (We bow our heads) before Thee, our Lord and our God.
lit_en: People :- (We bow our heads) before Thee, our Lord and our God.
lit_mn: People :- (We bow our heads) before Thee, our Lord and our God.

lit_ml: Priest :- (Prayer of the Sosaffa - Anaphora Veil)
lit_en: Priest :- (Prayer of the Sosaffa - Anaphora Veil)
lit_mn: Priest :- (Prayer of the Sosaffa - Anaphora Veil)

lit_ml: Acolyte :- Barekmor. Let us now stand well; let us stand in awe; let us stand with sober minds; let us stand in comeliness; let us stand in holiness; let us all, my brethren, stand in love and true faith, especially in the fear of God, and look upon this awe-inspiring and holy Anaphora that is set before us by the hands of this revered priest (OR Most Revered Holy Father OR Most Exalted Holy Father); for he offers the living sacrifice to God the Father, Lord of all things, on behalf of us all, in calm and peace.
lit_en: Acolyte :- Barekmor. Let us now stand well; let us stand in awe; let us stand with sober minds; let us stand in comeliness; let us stand in holiness; let us all, my brethren, stand in love and true faith, especially in the fear of God, and look upon this awe-inspiring and holy Anaphora that is set before us by the hands of this revered priest (OR Most Revered Holy Father OR Most Exalted Holy Father); for he offers the living sacrifice to God the Father, Lord of all things, on behalf of us all, in calm and peace.
lit_mn: Acolyte :- Barekmor. Let us now stand well; let us stand in awe; let us stand with sober minds; let us stand in comeliness; let us stand in holiness; let us all, my brethren, stand in love and true faith, especially in the fear of God, and look upon this awe-inspiring and holy Anaphora that is set before us by the hands of this revered priest (OR Most Revered Holy Father OR Most Exalted Holy Father); for he offers the living sacrifice to God the Father, Lord of all things, on behalf of us all, in calm and peace.

lit_ml: People :- (This *Anaphora is) mercy, peace, sacrifice and thanksgiving.
lit_en: People :- (This *Anaphora is) mercy, peace, sacrifice and thanksgiving.
lit_mn: People :- (This *Anaphora is) mercy, peace, sacrifice and thanksgiving.
